Translations.Text: I illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, sbuccuâen Öebbi. IneS tagelda; ineS wannuz; Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Neppa ikwen Ixelqen; segwen ajehli, segwen lmumen. Öebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Imsel ikwen, Iûeggem amsal nnwen. £uôeS tu$alin
Iéôa i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Iéôa ayen teffrem akked wayen tennam. Öebbi Iéôa i illan deg idmaren
Ma iusa kwen id usali n wid illan, zik, d ijehliyen? Jeôben lwexda n tikli nnsen. Fellasen, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Ayagi, imi sen ppasen imazanen nnsen s ubeggen. Nnan: "aâni d amdan ara $ inhun"? D$a jehlen, xedâan. Ur Iclaâ Öebbi. Öebbi d Asâay, d Amaâzuz
Pputebten ijehliyen ar, d awez$i, ur d pnekkaren. Ini: "xaîi! S Mass iw, ard a d tekkrem, sinna ard a ppepwaxebbôem $ef wayen txeddmem"! Ayagi, i Öebbi, d ushil
Ihi, amnet s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, akked tafat id Nessers. Öebbi Ippuxebbeô $ef wayen txeddmem

Ass ideg ara kwen Issemlil, i wass ujemmel, ass nni, d ass um$uôôu. Win iumnen s Öebbi, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad as Ikkes tucmitin is, a t Issekcem ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad iwekkeô i lebda. D wagi ay d rrbeê ameqwôaêan
